post.body: sleep well with sweet dreams lovely one
why thank you. I can understand the not wanting to be home bit, but we're glad to have you! I kinda like the pic too.
yes ma'am! Agreed!
welcome home sweetness! you have been missed my deah!

our kids have very similar taste in music. hmmmmm. perhaps this says something about us as moms ? :-)

that' s my hair ;-) the other pic was a summer pic from a yr ago with the beach hair ;-)
;-) thank you dear. But it's not a new haircolor. It's my hair color. :-)

thank you sweetie!! I love yours. We used to have a boxer, he was our darling!!
